title: markvin
author: markvin
content: Hello friendsI have few questations about IntelfinDo you have experience with Intelfin Global? If you do have can you share them?Thankshttps://intelfin.io/

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: It's just the typical scam trading bot promising high returns. Let's wake up, low risk + high returns doesn't exist. It's the reason why these people are bothering recruiting for memberships instead of taking the easy route of investing themselves. There's plenty of ways to get a starting capital especially if you're confident you'll be making a profit 24/7 lol.Quote from: https://web.archive.org/web/20220627163930/https://intelfin.io/Arbitration botIncome up to 22.4% per monthWhat is the winning formula? Low risk + high return. Our automated system works effectively in different markets, making a profit 24/7.

comments.author: markvin
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on June 27, 2022, 05:11:52 PMIt's just the typical scam trading bot promising high returns. Let's wake up, low risk + high returns doesn't exist. It's the reason why these people are bothering recruiting for memberships instead of taking the easy route of investing themselves. There's plenty of ways to get a starting capital especially if you're confident you'll be making a profit 24/7 lol.Quote from: https://web.archive.org/web/20220627163930/https://intelfin.io/Arbitration botIncome up to 22.4% per monthWhat is the winning formula? Low risk + high return. Our automated system works effectively in different markets, making a profit 24/7.You obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbye

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PMYou obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyeHey, why are you overacting? If you are over experienced then why have you asked here? You aren't appreciating negative comments means something went wrong. Are you asking a question or are you promoting your scam site? If you aren't ready to hear community opinion and want to invest big then go, who is preventing you? I am pretty sure you are promoting this site in the forum. Just noticed from your post history that you have shared this link on multiple threads.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PMYou obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyeIt's a blatant scam. I don't need to dip my fingers into a boiling water to know it'll hurt me. You can't guarantee % of profit on this, trading is already unstable as it is. They're basically saying it's a money making machine lol we are not in some kind of dreamland... Quote from: https://web.archive.org/web/20220210112619/https://intelfin.io/infocentreSingle assetActivate one liquidity pool, lasting for 3 months, with the required initial balance of 300 USDT and receive a fixed 6% of income monthly.Multi-assetActivate three liquidity pools, lasting for 6 months, with the necessary initial balance of 900 USDT and get a stable income of 7.5% per month.Diversified assetDiversify your risks together with an algorithm that will distribute your assets into 10 different pools, which will allow you to receive a 9% profit monthly.Followers, members, reviews or any kind of engangement can pretty much be bought these days, just look at this AMA thread of theirs with all the new accounts: https://www.reddit.com/r/Intelfinglobal/comments/uiappw/intelfin_ama/

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PMYou obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyeRelax, dude. You wanted to hear opinions and you got. If you don't like it, that's your problem. I shouldn't try every shady website with my money to tell that's scam.If yoy hear only positive reviews from people, why you're asking here? Go on and invest. But when it comes to investments, if something sounds to good to be true, better don't even try it. For me it's seems that you come here just to promote your business in such way.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PMYou obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience.Don't be stupid. if you don't need anyone to comment then do come here asking about people's opinionsQuote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PM I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyeOr probably you want to market your scam looking service here and didn't expect it to be exposed in the first place. Don't think we are stupid here. Just fuck with your scam bot.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: So... Why have you created 3 different threads in 3 different areas that are the same about this?  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404185.msg60451329#msg60451329https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404206.msg60453762#msg60453762And now this one? You sure look like your shilling for a scam to me...

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I guess he is trying to promote it here and he owns the website. I check the website and be careful of those who access it because he is collecting some data like IPs. I also check it with similarweb and most of the website traffic is from Russian. I do some deep scanning and research the website itself is secured and private but this website is hosted on Abelohost with Netherlands IP. The owner of the website seems Russian or living in the Netherlands. Since it looks like an investment site and the website info or owners info are in private then there is a big possibility that this website is scam 100%.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quick profit and low risk is something you rarely get from anonymous parties in the sense that what is happening here is "too good to be true" so it is best for you to assume it is a scam.Quote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PMYou obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyeThat's the weirdest excuse I've heard in a long time. Does identifying scam need to try the platform? Absolutely not. There are too many red flags that make you avoid this platform without even trying it.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on June 28, 2022, 05:24:14 PMQuote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PMYou obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyeThat's the weirdest excuse I've heard in a long time. Does identifying scam need to try the platform? Absolutely not. There are too many red flags that make you avoid this platform without even trying it.I would like to see where markvin saw those positive experiences?I did a little research and didn't find any true review about this service. if a published personal experience about Intelfin exists somewhere, maybe the OP could share it with us to make sure the rest of us.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 09:12:46 AMHello friendsI have few questations about IntelfinDo you have experience with Intelfin Global? If you do have can you share them?Thankshttps://intelfin.io/If you encounter a website offering a to good to be true profit given to you if you just trust them with your hard earned money then better tag it as scam, there are so many victims of the same scam site before so don't try to get your curiosity and be included as their new victim. Ignore the thoughts that you can earn with them and never believe on someone tell you that you can earn profit because for sure what they want is the referral bonus they get from you if they invest on that ponzi scheme site.

Low risk + high return. Our automated system works effectively in different markets, making a profit 24/7.You obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyePeople here are much experience about many scam attempts that's why they share their own thoughts about the website ask by OP and obviously there foot tracks with other scam site are the same. They make people believe that they are legitimate by paying the interest of their investment so that they will be urge to put more money or even invite their friends or other people nearby and the same with other once they accumulate huge funds they turn scam common repetitive actions by many scams platform use before also even now it still exist.

comments.author: stompix
comments.created_time: June 30, 2022, 09:01:41 AMLast edit: June 30, 2022, 09:47:37 AM by stompix
comments.body: Seriously, we're still getting those innocent "investors" asking questions about an obvious scam that:-promotes and advertises guaranteed profits?- a company without any physical location, name, licenses, contact numbers, nothing?- ToS that mention:Quote such as taxes and possible transaction fees, will be charged to your payment method (bank card, etc)when they don't actually accept anything but USDT  - company that trades:Quote "Digital Assets" refers to blockchain-based cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoins, Lightcoins, Etherium, Ripple  And he's back at it again:https://ninjastic.space/post/60468993Time for the "Intelfin Global is a SCAM" topic?

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: This is their explanatory video, here it says that the company has 9 years in the mentioned field, whois status says the site was created 2 years ago, where were they operated for the rest 7 years?I looked at the archive site and I didn't see any offers on their main page on the archives 2021 (at least until December, 9), so I don't know what kind of service was reviewed on truspilot last year.Quote from: markvin on June 27, 2022, 06:16:41 PMYou obviously have no experience so do not comment. I came here to hear other people personal experience. I only heard positive experiences from people who are in the sistem. I'm asking this because I have much bigger investments plans than them. Thanks and goodbyeIf you expect good reviews to promote any shady services, this is not your place. Rotten food will still smell even if you try to make it look fresh. In fact, the word "if it looks good, it's likely a scam" has been ingrained in the minds of gorum users as an investing principle.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I'm very skeptical newbies asking random websites that is investment related or so that claims too good to be true offers which is probably a scam. Look at his post history (spamming this website url) it's obvious that this user try to promote this website url instead of having a "positive response/experience"

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Even after this post, OP continues to post his scam site in different boards, so I highly believe he is trying to promote it here as he keeps praising his scam site when told a different opinion. This can not be tolerated anymore, so I am tagging + flagging the account.Post History archive: https://ninjastic.space/user/id/3485188?topicsThis is for the guests and newbies: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3007
